title: The Ly\alpha and Continuum Origins Survey. III. Investigating the link between galaxy morphology, merger properties and LyC escape
summary: This paper presents the Lyman-alpha and Continuum Origins Survey (LaCOS), the first program to obtain uniform, multi-wavelength sub-kpc imaging for a large sample of galaxies to study the link between galaxy morphology, merger properties, and LyC escape.
